<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Power Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=359) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 144 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=68) (Level 4), [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=256) (Level 4), [Battle Harbinger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=304) (Level 2)

</column>

---

You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage. If you’re at least 10th level, increase this to two extra dice, and if you’re at least 18th level, increase it to three extra dice.

<title level="2">Power Attack leads to...</title>
[Furious Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=381)
name: Power Attack
